name: I Do Not Forgive Those Who Laugh at My Family!!!
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Donquixote Pirates
effect: [Main]/[Counter] Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Donquixote Pirates} type card other than [I Do Not Forgive Those Who Laugh at My Family!!!] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
